message: If you want a time consuming command to notify you when it is finished but the command has been already running for some time, what do you do? Read the post :)
story: Ahmed Al-Amir shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Figure out when long-running jobs finish, without stopping them | Kevin Burke
caption: kev.inburke.com
description: Figure out when long-running jobs finish, without stopping themPosted on July 21, 2014You kick off a long running job - maybe a data migration script that operates on a large data set, or you're copying a large file from one disk to another, or from the Internet to your local computer.Then a few minâ€¦
